article:
You like surfing the Internet  in your free time, don't you? But do you know "Happy Farm"? If you _ " Happy Farm" is a farm in the countryside , you are wrong. "Happy Farm" is a computer _ . Players have their own farm and do things  _ farmers do on a farm  They plant seeds , water plants, pick worms  and harvest crops .
I have a farm, too. Every night after _  my homework, I turn on my computer to look after my farm. Every player takes care of their farms often First, I harvest my crops _ they are fully grown . _ , I sell  the crops. Third, I go shopping and buy the seeds. Fourth, I plant the seeds and wait for another harvest. In "Happy Farm", players can steal  the crops _ other people's farms. To protect  the crops, some players have a _  on their farm. I don't have enough money to buy a dog. _ I have a plan. First, I will save  money by selling my crops, and then I will have enough money to get a dog.
